name: Training
description: The World Food Program EMPACT project is providing training in digital and online tools.

name: Regularization
description: The Ecuadorian government expanded their regularization policy and you qualify to benefit from regular status documentation.

name: Accreditation
description: The Ecuadorian government is legalizing Venezuelans accreditations, degrees, and certifications.

name: Food Assistance
description: The World Food Programme is providing food assistance to struggling households within your community and you qualify to receive aid.

name: Cash Assistance
description: The World Food Program is providing cash assistance to buy nutritious food.

name: Medicines
description: The Ministry of Health is providing medicines at no cost for you and your family.
